item.description:
All,

Flag Football will be played this Saturday at Russell Field. See the map or travel by 'T' to the Alewife Stop, cross the Alewife Brook Pkwy toward Rindge Ave, and head to the football field (the one with lights).

All skill levels are welcome. We're trying to have fun first, then play some football. Plan on bringing water, its supposed to be HOT.

Hope you can make it.

-Frank
item.name: FLAG FOOTBALL - SAT 4PM - RUSSELL FIELD
